DOC.brief_summary: Intravitreal Bevacizumab effective treatment choroidal neovascularization secondary Angioid Streaks
DOC.brief_title: Use Intravitreal Bevacizumab Eyes With Choroidal Neovascularization Secondary Angioid Streaks
DOC.detailed_description: A consecutive case series patient angioid streak develop subfoveal choroidal neovascularization treat primary 2.5 mg injection Bevacizumab ( Avastin ) intravitreally . All patient evaluate BCVA 1 , 2 , 4 12 week OCT fluoresceine angiography month 1 3 . ( Patients follow 6 month )
DOC.criteria: Clinical diagnosis Angioid Streaks Choroidal neovascularization associate Untreated patient patient treat PDT Ocular surgery except uncomplicated phacoemulsification Glaucoma ocular pathology
